content.prompt: In the second half of the nineteenth century, the balance of power in Europe was greatly changed by

choices.label: the rapid increase of the French population
Britain's decision to concentrate on empire building in Africa and Asia
the unifications of Germany and of Italy
the emergence of an Ottoman threat to eastern Europe

topic.text: 7.9: Causation in 19th-Century Perspectives and Political Developments

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
